attributes.action: stop raising taxes on nationally enjoyed past times such as drinking alcohol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want you to stop raising taxes on beer and every other thing we enjoy,you ran up a national debt so you can pay it.Us the public should not have to pay for your mistakes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
